secondchanceforge.config.title: 第二次機會 配置
secondchanceforge.config.tooltip.coyoteT:
確定是否啟用了「郊狼時間」 功能。
 「郊狼時間」允許玩家從方塊邊緣跌落後一兩秒鐘內跳躍，以防止自己掉進坑裡。
 這不允許玩家進行雙重跳躍，只有從方塊邊緣跌落時才會啟動。
確定玩家方塊邊緣跌落後必須在多長時間內（以tick為單位）使用「郊狼時間」跳躍。
secondchanceforge.config.tooltip.secondC:
確定是否啟用了「第二次機會」功能。
 「第二次機會」，在7顆心或7顆心以上時，玩家在受到來自怪物或爆炸的致命傷害後，會留下半顆心。
確定啟動效果時是否播放「第二次機會」聲音。
確定「第二次機會」功能是否會被爆炸啟動。
確定「第二次機會」功能是否會被生物啟動。
secondchanceforge.config.option.secondCh: 第二次機會 啟動生命值
secondchanceforge.config.tooltip.secondC: 確定玩家必須至少有多少生命值才能啟動「第二次機會」。
secondchanceforge.config.option.secondCh: 第二次機會 剩餘生命值
secondchanceforge.config.tooltip.secondC: 確定「第二次機會」啟動後玩家應剩下多少生命值。
Determines if the 'Second Chance' feature will be activated by fall damage.
Determines if the 'Second Chance' feature will be activated by falling anvils.
Determines if the 'Second Chance' feature will be activated by lightning.
Determines if the 'Second Chance' feature will be activated by crashing into a wall.
Determines if the 'Second Chance' feature will be activated by falling blocks.
Determines if the 'Second Chance' feature will be activated by magic, such as potions.
Determines if the 'Second Chance' feature will be activated by players.
Determines if the 'Second Chance' feature will be activated by thrown tridents.
Determines if the 'Second Chance' feature will be activated by arrows.
Determines if the 'Second Chance' feature will be activated by fireworks.
Determines if the 'Second Chance' feature will be activated by Wither skulls.
secondchanceforge.config.tooltip.usePerc: Determines if the 'percentage of health' config values will be used instead of exact values.
secondchanceforge.config.tooltip.secondC: Determines what percent of health the player must start with for 'Second Chance' to activate.
Determines what percent of health the player should be left with after 'Second Chance' activates.
